OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM.synopsis: Dalyria and Petras at the flophouse.They are looking for Astarion at the place where they used to "hunt".This is a dialog for when they meet Astarion-Avatar or Astarion-Companion with the player-Avatar.They will tell Astarion they must inform Cazador that Astarion is back in the city. They will also reveal that Cazador is planning a ritual that requires all the spawn and that will grant them new powers.If Astarion knows that Cazador is actually planning to sacrifice all the spawn, he might be able to convince the spawn about this sacrifice. In exchange, they will reveal a bit of information about Cazador's Palace.After the dialog, they disappear as clouds of mist.
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM.how_to_trigger: Origin Debug Book (Ctrl+Shift+7)Astarion - Recruit - As Avatar (for AOM) or Companion (for COM)Astarion - Act 3 Origin Moments - Vampire Spawns Duo at FlophouseWalk in the direction the player character is facing.Click on Petra or Dalyria.

OM_Astarion_COM.synopsis: Dalyria and Petras at the flophouse.They are looking for Astarion at the place where they used to "hunt".This is a dialog for when they meet Astarion-companion with player-Avatar.They will tell Astarion they must inform Cazador that Astarion is back in the city. They will also reveal that Cazador is planning a ritual that requires all the spawn and that will grant them new powers.If the player & Astarion know that Cazador is actually planning to sacrifice all the spawn, he might be able to convince the spawn about this sacrifice. In exchange, they will reveal a bit of information about Cazador's Palace.After the dialog they disappear as clouds of mist.
OM_Astarion_COM.how_to_trigger: Origin Debug Book (Ctrl+Shift+7)Astarion - Recruit - As CompanionAstarion - Act 3 Origin Moments - Vampire Spawns Duo at FlophouseWalk in the direction the player character is facing.Click on Petra or Dalyria.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_29.speaker: Narrator
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_29.text: *You know these people. Spawn, bound to Cazador, just as you once were.*

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_151.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_151.text: We'll leave for the Black Mass soon. I only need one more mark.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_9.speaker: Dalyria
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_9.text: We don't need another - the master said we have enough.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_147.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_147.text: It's not for the master - it's for me. I spent one hundred years eating rats and dogs, but soon I'll be free to feast.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_67.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_67.text: I want someone there, ready for me. Once the Mass is done and our master grants us our freedom, I'll want a drink.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_4.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_4.text: What Black Mass? What's Cazador planning?

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_90.speaker: Dalyria
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_90.text: The Black Mass will be the master's greatest triumph. The ritual will see him ascend to power no vampire has ever known.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_65.speaker: Dalyria
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_65.text: And he promises that once he has ascended, he will give us our freedom.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_17.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_17.text: There won't be any Black Mass - I'm going to kill Cazador.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_25.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_25.text: But it is. And as arrogant as ever.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_70.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_70.text: You can't raise a hand to the master, let alone kill him.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_6.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_6.text: You have no idea what I can do.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_166.speaker: Dalyria
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_166.text: Brother, please, just come home with us. There is no need to fight.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_149.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_149.text: If you still serve him, I'll kill you too.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_36.speaker: Dalyria
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_36.text: Brother! You know we have no choice in this.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_39.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_39.text: Don't be an idiot, Dal. He's all talk - always has been.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_118.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_118.text: Go on, 'brother'. Show us what you can do.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_145.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_145.text: Grab him by the throat and drag him towards the sunlight coming through the window.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_18.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion grabs Petras by the throat and drags him over towards the window. Standing full in the daylight, Astarion slowly pulls Petras closer and closer to the sunbeam.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_87.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_87.context: CinematicNodeContext: Petras is starting to burn in the light

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_83.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_83.text: Tell me what I need to know, or I swear you'll burn.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_105.speaker: Dalyria
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_105.text: Astarion, please! I'll tell you everything - just release him!

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_168.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion releases his hold on Petras's throat - he staggers away from the light coming through the window, doubled-over as he catches his breath

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_144.speaker: Dalyria
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_144.text: There's a defiled chapel under the master's palace - hidden there the entire time. That's where he's preparing the Black Mass.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_126.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_126.text: What the hells happened to you? What are you?
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_126.context: NodeContext: recovering from Astarion's assault, shocked and scared

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_159.speaker: Dalyria
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_159.text: Whatever changed you, brother - whatever you have become - the master still wants you. He will not stop looking for you.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_101.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_101.text: We'll see you soon, Astarion. I'm going to remember this.
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_101.context: NodeContext: Resentful - still sore from being choked

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_117.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_117.text: The greatest vampire that ever lived.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_55.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion forces Petra's face further into the sunlight streaming through the window. Smoke starts to rise from Petras' face.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_34.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Held in the sunlight by Astarion, smoke starts to rise from Petras' face. He roars in pain.NodeContext: A vampire being burned by the sunlight

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_12.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_12.context: NodeContext: In pain, being burned by the sun

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_146.speaker: Dalyria
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_146.text: How could you turn on us? We're family.
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_146.context: NodeContext: Can't believe what Astarion's done, stress on 'family'

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_122.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion releases Petras, tossing him back to original stage setting, standing by Dalyria

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_33.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_33.text: I'm gonna find you when the Mass is done, brother. Then you'll see what real power looks like.
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_33.context: NodeContext: Recovering from Astarion (his brother) choking and burning him.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_19.context: CinematicNodeContext: Both vampire spawn turn to mist and vanish, leaving just Astarion and the party in the room

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_110.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_110.text: I'm the master now and you will obey.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_156.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_156.text: The sun can't harm me anymore.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_91.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion tries to grab Petras, but he pushes him back and bares his fangs

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_86.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_86.text: You're still the runt of the litter, Astarion. Nothing's changed.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_35.speaker: Dalyria
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_35.text: I can't believe you'd turn on us - on your own family.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_164.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_164.text: Listen to me, damn it! I'm trying to save you, even if you're too stupid to see it.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_154.speaker: Dalyria
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_154.text: You... you really think the master would kill us?

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_114.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_114.text: Don't listen to him, Dal. We've been loyal - we've earned our reward. Unlike the runaway.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_80.speaker: Dalyria
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_80.text: But when has the master ever rewarded us? When has he given us anything? And now he offers us freedom?

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_112.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_112.text: You believe this? You believe that most self-centred, arrogant, egotistical one of us all is here to save the day?

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_16.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_16.text: When has Astarion ever done anything that isn't in his own self-interest?

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_109.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_109.text: I admit, I wasn't the best brother to you, so let me make it up to you. Let me save you.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_3.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_3.text: No, you were a piece of shit. And you're still a piece of shit.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_38.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_38.text: Let's go. We don't need to listen to this.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_78.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_78.text: It's in all of our interests to see Cazador dead. We'll all be free.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_94.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_94.text: You're lying - it can't be done.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_107.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_107.text: Dalyria, I know you're smarter than this. Tell me what I need to know.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_8.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_8.text: You're wasting your breath. We won't tell you anything.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_5.speaker: Dalyria
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_5.text: Cazador's in the defiled chapel - beneath the palace.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_106.speaker: Dalyria
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_106.text: The chapel has been there forever - hidden from all. There will be a sacrifice -
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_106.context: NodeContext: Full sentence: "there will be a sacrifice and then the master will ascend", but gets cut off by Petra

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_160.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_160.text: Enough! Before you get us flayed alive.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_123.speaker: Dalyria
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_123.text: Please, Astarion. If you're telling the truth, please help us.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_7.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_7.text: He's not telling the truth! And we don't need his help.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_46.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_46.text: This isn't over. We'll see you again, 'brother'.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_2.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_2.text: Walk to the window, into the sunlight.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_41.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion moves to the window and turns his face to the sun, smiling, then turns back to the vampire spawn. They're shocked.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_158.speaker: Dalyria
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_158.context: NodeContext: Seeing Astarion standing in the sun without bursting into flames as a vampire should

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_116.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_116.text: It's a trick - some glamour or spell. True power only comes from the master, and it will be ours soon.
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_116.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion steps out of the sunlight and returns to his original staging/position.NodeContext: Shocked, trying to justify what he's just seen and reassure himself

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_13.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_13.text: Fine, go and die for your master if that's what you want.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_108.speaker: Dalyria
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_108.text: How could you say such things? We're family.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_40.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_40.text: He's not our family. Not anymore.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_0.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_0.text: We'll see you again, Astarion. This isn't over.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_59.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_59.text: Nothing. Die if you want to, Petras.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_21.speaker: Dalyria
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_21.text: Don't seek him, brother, please. He was so angry when you left.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_136.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_136.text: Show your face in the palace again and he'll punish you - destroy you.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_64.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_64.text: He'll destroy all of you if the Black Mass goes ahead.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_61.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_61.text: As if you'd know the first thing about the master's plans. He's going to give us freedom - he's going to give us power.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_133.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_133.text: When has Cazador given us anything other than beatings?

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_63.speaker: Dalyria
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_63.text: I... I can't say you're wrong.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_44.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_44.text: The master has always been... strict. But we're better for it.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_57.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_57.text: That's why we're worthy of freedom - of being elevated. And you're just a runt to be put down.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_111.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_111.text: Your only hope of freedom is his death. So tell me where he is.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_143.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_143.text: Believe what you want - I'm done with you.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_60.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_60.text: You're just jealous. You lost your chance. You're not part of the family anymore.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_172.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_172.text: And you never will be. Come for him if you're stupid enough - he'll be waiting.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_141.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_141.text: I can show you real power. Right now.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_24.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_24.text: You're all talk. You always were.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_96.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_96.text: You can be free without him. You can be powerful without him - I am the proof.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_79.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_79.text: You're proof of nothing. You're hiding in the shadows, just like the rest of us.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_49.speaker: Dalyria
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_49.text: What if he's telling the truth, Petras? He is free.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_85.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_85.text: Free to be hunted like a dog.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_10.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_10.text: But if he is telling the truth, then he can prove it.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_140.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_140.text: You have no idea what I can do. Tell me where to find him or I'll make you pay.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_48.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_48.text: I'm not afraid of the old man.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_120.speaker: Dalyria
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_120.text: Perhaps you should be. When the Black Mass is complete, he'll be stronger than ever.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_20.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_20.text: And once it's done, he'll give us our freedom. He'll give us power.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_100.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_100.text: Cazador won't free you - he's going to sacrifice you in the ritual.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_157.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_157.text: The 'Master' promised you freedom? And you believed him?

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_119.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_119.text: Sounds like a delightful dinner plan. Perhaps I'll join you.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_102.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_102.text: You think you can just walk back in here with some stupid quip? On the eve of the master's ascension?

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_56.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_56.text: I'll be blunt, then. Cazador plans to sacrifice us all at his 'ascension' ritual.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_66.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_66.text: Where is this ritual happening? Where can I find Cazador?

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_69.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_69.text: Of course that's why he came crawling back. He wants to ascend with the rest of us.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_53.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_53.text: He heard about the ritual and the power our master will grant us, so he came back with his tail between his legs, hoping all would be forgiven.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_97.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_97.text: Tell me about this 'ascension' - what's Cazador planning?

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_75.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_75.text: I'm going to kill Cazador. Just tell me where to find him.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_23.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_23.text: Now that's funny. And the best part is you actually believe it.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_31.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_31.text: I have more than quips. You have no idea what I'm capable of.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_150.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_150.text: Why should Cazador ascend? I'd make a much better master than him.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_92.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_92.text: If the Mass goes ahead, you'll be dead, not free. Cazador intends to sacrifice you.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_121.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_121.text: Not if I kill him first. I just need to know where this 'Black Mass' is happening.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_98.speaker: Dalyria
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_98.text: Kill the master? It's - it's not possible.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_165.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_165.text: You have no idea what I can do.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_32.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_32.text: Tell me what I need to know, or I swear you'll burn.

OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_99.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_AOM_OOM_99.text: Cazador promised you freedom? And you believed him?

OM_Astarion_COM_69.speaker: Dalyria
OM_Astarion_COM_69.text: We should go. I do not want to face the master if we're late for his Black Mass.

OM_Astarion_COM_95.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_COM_95.text: Soon, sister. I only need one more mark.

OM_Astarion_COM_148.speaker: Dalyria
OM_Astarion_COM_148.text: We have enough for the master - no more are needed.

OM_Astarion_COM_96.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_COM_96.text: It's not for the master, it's for me. I spent one hundred years eating rats and dogs, but soon I'll be able to feast.

OM_Astarion_COM_43.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_COM_43.text: I want someone there, ready for me. And once the Mass is done and our lord grants us our freedom, I can celebrate by drinking them dry.

OM_Astarion_COM_109.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_109.text: Cazador promised you your freedom? And you believed him?
OM_Astarion_COM_109.context: NodeContext: Incredulous that they believed Cazador

OM_Astarion_COM_111.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_111.text: You were never burdened with intelligence, Petras, but your load seems especially light these days.

OM_Astarion_COM_28.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_28.text: That's no way to welcome back a brother, Dal. Didn't you miss me?

OM_Astarion_COM_138.speaker: Dalyria
OM_Astarion_COM_138.text: Why would you come back? You got out - you were free.

OM_Astarion_COM_48.speaker: Player
OM_Astarion_COM_48.text: We're here to kill Cazador. That's the only way you'll be free.

OM_Astarion_COM_106.speaker: Dalyria
OM_Astarion_COM_106.context: NodeContext: startled, drops her voice to almost a whisper for "Kill the master", as if she's afraid her master will hear

OM_Astarion_COM_94.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_COM_94.text: He's playing mind games. He can't raise a hand to the master, let alone kill him.

OM_Astarion_COM_141.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_141.text: You have no idea what I can do.

OM_Astarion_COM_83.speaker: Player
OM_Astarion_COM_83.text: What is Cazador planning? What do you know?

OM_Astarion_COM_97.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_COM_97.text: Of course that's why he came crawling back. He wants to ascend with the rest of us.

OM_Astarion_COM_145.speaker: Player
OM_Astarion_COM_145.text: Just tell us about the ritual. What do you know?

OM_Astarion_COM_15.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_COM_15.text: Isn't it obvious, sister? He wants to ascend with the rest of us.

OM_Astarion_COM_149.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_COM_149.text: He heard about the ritual and the power our master will grant us, so he came back with his tail between his legs, hoping all would be forgiven.

OM_Astarion_COM_128.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_128.text: You always were an idiot, Petras.

OM_Astarion_COM_45.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion grabs Petra by the throat and drags him over towards the window. Standing full in the daylight, Astarion slowly pulls Petra closer and closer to the sunbeam.

OM_Astarion_COM_20.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_20.text: Why does Cazador need me? What is he planning?
OM_Astarion_COM_20.context: CinematicNodeContext: Petra's close enough to the sunlight that he's starting to smoke

OM_Astarion_COM_35.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_COM_35.context: CinematicNodeContext: Petra is starting to burn in the light

OM_Astarion_COM_71.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_71.text: You heard them. Tell me what I need to know. Now.

OM_Astarion_COM_62.speaker: Dalyria
OM_Astarion_COM_62.text: The master is preparing the Black Mass. Beneath his palace. There's a defiled chapel - it was hidden there the entire time. Hidden from us all.

OM_Astarion_COM_56.speaker: Dalyria
OM_Astarion_COM_56.text: The Black Mass - it will be his triumph. He'll complete the ritual and emerge the Vampire Ascendant.

OM_Astarion_COM_14.speaker: Dalyria
OM_Astarion_COM_14.text: He'll walk in the sun, he'll be free of the hunger, he'll wield power no vampire has ever possessed.

OM_Astarion_COM_81.speaker: Dalyria
OM_Astarion_COM_81.text: Best of all, we'll join him. His loyal servants - walking in the light as living vampires. We'll be free, brother.

OM_Astarion_COM_90.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_90.text: You can't believe that. You can't be that stupid.
OM_Astarion_COM_90.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion throws Petras away, releasing his grip on his throat. Petras and Dalyria revert to default positions in the dialog.

OM_Astarion_COM_110.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_110.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion throws Petras away, releasing his grip on his throat. Petras and Dalyria revert to default positions in the dialog.

OM_Astarion_COM_102.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_COM_102.text: What the hells happened to you, Astarion? What are you?

OM_Astarion_COM_126.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_126.text: I'm more than what I was. And I'm not afraid of anything anymore.

OM_Astarion_COM_101.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_101.text: The sun can't harm me, Cazador can't compel me. I'm the only person who can stop him.

OM_Astarion_COM_31.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_31.text: Now go, before I change my mind about roasting you, brother.

OM_Astarion_COM_131.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_131.text: Tell me what I need to know, or I swear you'll burn.

OM_Astarion_COM_147.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion throws Petras away, releasing his grip on his throat. Petras and Dalyria revert to default positions in the dialog.

OM_Astarion_COM_17.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_17.text: You owe your wretched life to my friend. Now tell me what I need to know.

OM_Astarion_COM_23.speaker: Dalyria
OM_Astarion_COM_23.text: The master is preparing the Black Mass. Beneath his palace. There's a defiled chapel - it was hidden there the entire time. Hidden from us all.

OM_Astarion_COM_4.speaker: Dalyria
OM_Astarion_COM_4.text: Do you really think you can stop him?

OM_Astarion_COM_27.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_27.text: I'm the only one who can.

OM_Astarion_COM_55.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_55.text: The sun can't harm me, Cazador can't compel me. I don't need to fear him anymore.

OM_Astarion_COM_93.speaker: Dalyria
OM_Astarion_COM_93.text: The Black Mass - it will be his triumph. He'll complete the ritual and emerge the Vampire Ascendant.

OM_Astarion_COM_139.speaker: Dalyria
OM_Astarion_COM_139.text: He'll walk in the sun, he'll be free of the hunger, he'll tap into power no vampire has ever dreamed of.

OM_Astarion_COM_140.speaker: Dalyria
OM_Astarion_COM_140.text: Best of all, we'll join him. His loyal servants - walking in the light as living vampires. We'll be free, brother.

OM_Astarion_COM_115.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_115.text: You can't believe that, Dal. When has Cazador ever shared power?

OM_Astarion_COM_117.speaker: Dalyria
OM_Astarion_COM_117.text: We deserve this, Astarion. Can't you see? We've given him everything - our blood and tears - and he's finally going to reward us.

OM_Astarion_COM_3.speaker: Dalyria
OM_Astarion_COM_3.text: And you will be with us when the time comes. It's fate, written in your very flesh.

OM_Astarion_COM_132.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vampire spawns turn to mist and vanish from the scene

OM_Astarion_COM_108.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_108.text: Poor fools. They actually think Cazador will save them...

OM_Astarion_COM_33.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_33.text: You sound surprised - I am capable of doing the right thing from time to time.

OM_Astarion_COM_119.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_119.text: Yes. And they'll be trembling in fear when they tell him.

OM_Astarion_COM_134.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_134.text: They're no threat to us, and they have no choice but to do Cazador's bidding. I pity them.

OM_Astarion_COM_57.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_57.text: Worst of all, they don't know their fate's already set. They're doomed.

OM_Astarion_COM_125.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_125.text: The only question is whether their lives will be sacrificed to a monster like Cazador or serve a greater purpose.

OM_Astarion_COM_12.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_12.text: Seven sigils on seven spawn, and Cazador has the other six. We have to face him and take that power for ourselves.

OM_Astarion_COM_113.speaker: Player
OM_Astarion_COM_113.text: Those six spawn are your brothers and sisters. Are you ready to sacrifice them?

OM_Astarion_COM_16.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_16.text: Trust me, I'd rather slaughter someone else's family, but... if that's what it takes.

OM_Astarion_COM_129.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_129.text: And it's not like they're sweet innocents: they brought Cazador just as many victims as I did.

OM_Astarion_COM_11.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_11.text: You're not getting sentimental, are you? I thought you were with me on this.

OM_Astarion_COM_10.speaker: Player
OM_Astarion_COM_10.text: Why not stay away? Cazador can't finish the ritual if he can't find you.

OM_Astarion_COM_1.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_1.text: And spend every day looking over my shoulder? Waiting for someone to grab me and drag me back to the shadows?

OM_Astarion_COM_25.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_25.text: No, I won't spend eternity as a fugitive. I need to end this.

OM_Astarion_COM_151.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_151.text: Besides, I'll need something to protect me from the sun if things don't work out with our parasite friends. This ritual could set me free.

OM_Astarion_COM_53.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_53.text: And you want what's best for me, surely?

OM_Astarion_COM_143.speaker: Player
OM_Astarion_COM_143.text: I just want you to be happy.

OM_Astarion_COM_44.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_44.text: Then you'll help me in this. Nothing would make me happier.

OM_Astarion_COM_0.speaker: Player
OM_Astarion_COM_0.text: We're a team. I've got your back.

OM_Astarion_COM_121.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_121.text: I knew I was right about you. You're a true friend.

OM_Astarion_COM_19.speaker: Player
OM_Astarion_COM_19.text: And what if we're walking into a trap?

OM_Astarion_COM_24.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_24.text: Then we'll deal with it! It can't be worse than everything else we've faced.

OM_Astarion_COM_137.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_137.text: And now that we know he's skulking beneath his palace, we can take the hunt to Cazador.

OM_Astarion_COM_116.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_116.text: Well figure it out. I need to know I can rely on you.

OM_Astarion_COM_80.speaker: Player
OM_Astarion_COM_80.text: Can we go? We got what we need - the ritual's below the palace.

OM_Astarion_COM_124.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_124.text: All right, let's go. This place stinks of rat blood and despair.

OM_Astarion_COM_30.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_30.text: Well yes, technically only I will ascend and gain the ritual's power.
OM_Astarion_COM_30.context: NodeContext: "Well yes, TECHNICALLY only I'll have all the power..."

OM_Astarion_COM_74.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_74.text: But we're a team. If I become all-powerful, then we become all-powerful.
OM_Astarion_COM_74.context: NodeContext: emphasis on "I" and "we", as if explaining to a child

OM_Astarion_COM_89.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_89.text: We are a team, aren't we? You're still with me?

OM_Astarion_COM_127.speaker: Player
OM_Astarion_COM_127.text: Sometimes you scare me more than the elder brain does.

OM_Astarion_COM_105.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_105.text: But there's nothing to be afraid of - we're a team after all.

OM_Astarion_COM_107.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_107.text: I knew I could count on you. It's that killer instinct I love so much.

OM_Astarion_COM_61.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_61.text: I knew I could count on you. We share that killer instinct.

OM_Astarion_COM_100.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_100.text: And now we know that Cazador's skulking somewhere beneath the palace, it'll be infinitely easier to track him down.

OM_Astarion_COM_123.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_123.context: NodeContext: Contemplating just how good that would be

OM_Astarion_COM_36.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_36.text: Who wouldn't be interested? It's the ultimate freedom.

OM_Astarion_COM_41.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_41.text: Freedom from the hunger, freedom to live a real life in the sun - no tadpole required.

OM_Astarion_COM_92.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_92.text: And if I were to ascend instead of him: freedom from Cazador, once and for all.

OM_Astarion_COM_29.speaker: Player
OM_Astarion_COM_29.text: Aren't you part of the sacrifice? Surely you'd be destroyed too?

OM_Astarion_COM_63.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_63.text: Perhaps, but it's a devils' deal. They always have some loophole or another.

OM_Astarion_COM_136.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_136.text: And just think - I could rid myself of the mind flayers' parasite without losing anything.

OM_Astarion_COM_49.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_49.text: In fact, I'd be more powerful than ever. More powerful than any vampire has ever been.

OM_Astarion_COM_47.speaker: Player
OM_Astarion_COM_47.text: I'm with you, no matter what.

OM_Astarion_COM_39.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_39.text: I am. More sure than I've ever been.

OM_Astarion_COM_66.speaker: Player
OM_Astarion_COM_66.text: If it was possible to take Cazador's place, you'd have to sacrifice the other spawn.

OM_Astarion_COM_87.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_87.text: It comes with a cost, yes. All great things do.

OM_Astarion_COM_64.speaker: Player
OM_Astarion_COM_64.text: Is that possible? For you to take his place?

OM_Astarion_COM_51.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_51.text: Well, it might be. And there's only one way to find out.

OM_Astarion_COM_50.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_50.text: It doesn't feel like a lie. It feels like exactly the kind of power Cazador would chase.

OM_Astarion_COM_104.speaker: Player
OM_Astarion_COM_104.text: Don't get ahead of yourself - there's a lot we don't know.

OM_Astarion_COM_99.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_99.text: Perhaps, but if I don't confront him some day, I know I'll spend the rest of my life running from him.

OM_Astarion_COM_9.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_9.text: And if I can take this power from him, it would set me free. Truly free.

OM_Astarion_COM_2.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_2.text: I have to know. I have to face him.

OM_Astarion_COM_75.speaker: Player
OM_Astarion_COM_75.text: What of it? You can already walk in the sun.

OM_Astarion_COM_40.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_40.text: Yes, but only because of the parasite. This would be true freedom.

OM_Astarion_COM_133.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_133.text: Don't tell me what to do!
OM_Astarion_COM_133.context: CinematicNodeContext: turning to look at player over his shoulder while still holding Petra by the throat

OM_Astarion_COM_60.speaker: Pale Petras
OM_Astarion_COM_60.text: You never liked following orders, brother. That's why you won't ascend with the rest of us.

OM_Astarion_COM_26.speaker: Astarion
OM_Astarion_COM_26.text: Where is he hiding? TELL ME.
OM_Astarion_COM_26.context: CinematicNodeContext: Petra's close enough to the sunlight that he's starting to smoke
